title: The Backseat And The Barbershop
itunes:title: The Backseat And The Barbershop
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a married woman in my late forties. I have a boyfriend that’s 5 years younger than I am and he’s also married. He is co-owner of a barbershop and that’s where I met him. We’ve been seeing each other for a few weeks and he’s got long work hours, so we have to have sex whenever and wherever we can. The first time we were intimate, it was magical...................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
